snippet.title: Fevers, Chills, 5 Blankets, Oh My!
snippet.description: * Fevers, Chills, 5 Blankets, Oh My! 20 hours on a plane is no fun. 20 hours of fevers & chills on a plane squished into economy class is even less fun. Thank goodness I had a narcotic cough suppressant to keep from hacking on my fellow sufferers, but the fever made me delirious. I ...

snippet.title: Sidestream cigarette smoke more toxic than mainstream smoke
snippet.description: * Sidestream cigarette smoke more toxic than mainstream smoke In my last post about tobacco smoke pollution I mentioned the puzzling fact that although exposure to tobacco smoke pollution (TSP or ETS or SHS) gives about 1-5% of the smoke dose of active smoking, it gives a proportionately bigger increase in some...
